snippet.title: Red Ops: The First Infection
snippet.description:
Red Ops : The First Infection is an engaging BL/yaoi visual novel (18+) featuring hardships, world-ending events and romance. Please look forward to it! In the meantime, sign-up to be notified for our Kickstarter launch: bit.ly/45CTmWk
For more information, follow us on Twitter: bit.ly/3OKwnTA
